Sergio Marchionne said Chrysler remains grateful for the bailouts and noted that no other parties were willing to assist in Chrysler's recovery. The two governments levied interest rates that, although appropriate at the time, are above current market conditions, he continued.`` This was done with the full support and understanding of the members of Chrysler Group LLC.'' the congresswoman who was shot in the head on Jan. 8, is continuing to recover at an amazing rate, her friend, New York Senator Kirsten Gillibrand , said. Via her Twitter account, Kirsten Gillibrand said Gabrielle Giffords continues to defy the odds in her recovery, after she visited the Houston rehabilitation hospital where Gabrielle Giffords is being treated. The congresswoman was transported to Memorial Hermann-Texas Medical Center on Friday, making`` strong progress'' in her recovery after

spark for Detroit after a slow start, winning his first game since joining the Pistons, 100-92 over the Sacramento LeBron Jamess on Tuesday night.`` It was a huge lift off of me,'' Allen Iverson said. I knew it would happen. You think every game you go out and play it's going to happen. It feels good. I wanted to get the monkey off my back. I'm just excited that I got my first win and I can now try to get a lot more. Tayshaun Prince added 26 points and 11 rebounds for the Pistons, who had lost their first two games since acquiring Allen Iverson from DEnver Lisin last week for All-Star point guard Chauncey Billups , key reserve Antonio McDyess and Cheikh Samb .
